primitiveView.SQLQuery: SELECT l.num_speakers AS num_speakers, l.language_id AS language_id, l.language_description AS language_description, l.language_label AS language_label FROM book_db.Language l
SELECT i.author_id AS author_id FROM book_db.InfluencedBy i
SELECT a.author_genre_id AS author_genre_id FROM book_db.Author_Genre a
SELECT c.country_label AS country_label, c.country_id AS country_id, c.country_description AS country_description FROM book_db.Country c
SELECT h.book_id AS book_id, h.character_id AS character_id FROM book_db.hasCharacter h
SELEC FROM book_db.FictionalHuman f
SELECT l.country_id AS country_id, l.publisher_id AS publisher_id FROM book_db.locatedIn l
SELECT h.country_id AS country_id, h.book_id AS book_id FROM book_db.hasCountryLocation h
SELECT h.realcity_id AS realcity_id, h.mayor_id AS mayor_id FROM book_db.hasMayor h
SELECT b.language_id AS language_id, b.book_id AS book_id FROM book_db.BookWrittenIn b
SELECT h.realcity_id AS realcity_id, h.country_id AS country_id FROM book_db.hasCountry h
SELEC FROM book_db.FictionalCity f
